entry.title: Wolf Transformation
entry.summary:
Author: NorthLiang37

Summary: Nightwing transformed into a wolf.——————————————————————————————————————"I suppose this is indeed better than staying up all night," Alfred murmured with a soft sigh. "See you in the morning, boys."Jason drifted in and out of consciousness, hovering between night and day, completely unaware of what had just happened. He turned his head, burying his face in the relatively soft wolf fur, muttering incoherent dreams while clutching the black wolf's foreleg tightly.Sleep, Dick thought. I'll stay here until the end of the world.Even then, he imagined he would still hear his heartbeat pounding against the moon like a drum, synchronized with Jason's. The distance between them would remain this close, even as the vast chaos around them continued to expand endlessly.In the end, love lingered, and all the stories melted into the wind under the scorching sun.

entry.title: FUEGO, CENIZAS Y FUEGO OTRA VEZ / FIRE, ASHES AND FIRE AGAIN
entry.summary:
Author: WonderWritter

Summary: Las vidas de Jon y Damian se entrelazan cuando se conocen en la universidad, todo es genial en su relación, tanto, que deciden hacer las cosas más formales, lo que no sabían es que su historia no comienza con ellos, sino con las personas que los anteceden.Universo alternativo Clark y Bruce son padres solteros (sin poderes) Viven sus vidas con sus respectivos hijos y con un interesante pasado en común, no sabían que volverían a encontrarse hasta que descubren que sus hijos están enamorados, lo que ellos no saben es que éstos se conocieron mucho antes, y vaya que se conocían muy bien.

entry.title: Talk with a Stranger
entry.summary:
Author: ladybluerobin

Summary: Dick Grayson, a student at Justice Academy, accidentally texts the wrong number when he changes his cell phone and mistakes his best friend Wally West's number. Jason Todd, a boy with a little problem, receives a message from a stranger who soon begins to become very present in his life, so much so that Jason doesn't mind as he normally would.Or: Where Dick sends Jason messages and Jason responds to each and every one of them.Adaptation of Text Talk from merlywhirls

entry.title: The Ancient One
entry.summary:
Author: CalesDaughter2

Summary: Danny, chosen to become "The Ancient One," a being of immense power, finds solace in the care of the Ancients, who treat him like family. However, one by one, they disappear, leaving him with their powers. Despite their love, Danny must ultimately become the Ancient One, a fate that means losing his family. Devastated, he is left alone, sought after by cults and fanatics. Holding the mementos of his lost family, Danny hopes that a mysterious man who recently summoned him might offer the chance to have a family again.

entry.title: your love is tried and true blue
entry.summary:
Author: phagus

Summary: Dick had the bluest eyes Jason had ever seen.It was the first thing he’d notice about the man. Everything about Dick had always been incandescent, the perfect contrived commercial-like beauty that Jason always thought he had no right to look at, his eyes burn and his throat dries up when he does, but Dick’s eyes were breathtaking.Jason doesn’t know if he likes it.
